entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
